name: AstroJump (BrownieDev)
description:
HELLO 

The following are the modification i've made:

  1. Made the levels vertical and parkour based , the player must finish the parkour before the lava reaches him.
  2. Changed the acid into lava 
  3. Made a script that moves the Lava vertically 
  4. Changed the Lose and Win UI's 
  5. Changed the Main Menu UI and background
